name: \IPv6Control
tagline: Application to make it easy to configure several advance Microsoft Windows IPv6 settings.
body:
### What is it? \IPv6Control is a portable application to allow to enable or disable several IPv6 transition technologies in Microsoft Windows. Normally to disable these technologies the Windows registry has to be used but this application allow the user to disable or enable several IPv6 transition technologies by just using several checkboxes. ### Screenshot ![Main](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/D9ping/IPv6Control/gh-pages/img/screenshot_frmmain_w10_v0.8.0.png "Main window") ### Changelog 2016-07-21 version 0.6.0
First beta release. ### Support or Contact If you found a bug please [open a issue](https://github.com/D9ping/IPv6Control/issues/new). ### Authors and Contributors \IPv6Control is created by @D9ping.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
